subscription.title: Premium Subscription
subscription.cancelNotice: Your subscription has been cancelled. Premium features will remain available until the end of your current billing period.

confirmCancel.title: Cancel Subscription
confirmCancel.message:
Are you sure you want to cancel your premium subscription?

You'll continue to have access to premium features until the end of your current billing period.
confirmCancel.error: An error occurred while cancelling your subscription.

likes.title: Additional Likes
likes.description: Buy only what you need when you run out of likes

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime. Even after cancellation, you'll continue to have access to premium features until the end of your current billing period.

payment.question: Is my payment information secure?
payment.answer: All payment information is securely processed through Stripe, and Glimpse does not store any card information.

likes.question: How long can I use purchased likes?
likes.answer: Purchased likes are stored in your account until used and never expire.
